title: Wall of warnings in a souce build

content.raw:
# Prerequisites
* [x] Checked the Q&A board for common solutions: http://answers.gazebosim.org
* [x] Checked that your issue isn't already filed.
* [x] Checked that there is not already an Ignition package that provides the described functionality: https://ignitionrobotics.org/libs

# Description 

Build time warnings (loads of them) cluttering the output and make it difficult to see important warnings in other projects in parallel builds.

# Steps to Reproduce

1. Download the default tag version
2. Compile using default arguments
3. Use gcc-latest (9) to do so

**Expected behavior:**  

No warnings (or limited warnings)

**Actual behavior:**

Wall of warnings

**Reproduces how often:** 

100%

# Versions

Arch Linux, GCC-9, CMake 3.15

# Additional Information

[Pastebin](https://pastebin.com/dWvZhibr)
